cmd.error.permission: You don't have permission for this command.
cmd.error.player-only: This command can only be executed by a player.
cmd.error.console-only: This command can only be executed by the console.
cmd.player.info.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp player info <player>
cmd.player.permission.add.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp player permission add <player> <permission>
cmd.player.group.list.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp player group list <player>
cmd.player.group.add.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp player group add <player> <group>
cmd.player.group.remove.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp player group remove <player> <group>
cmd.group.info.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp group info <group>
cmd.group.add.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp group add <name>
cmd.group.remove.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp group remove <group>
cmd.group.permission.add.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp group permission add <group> <permission> <nbt>
cmd.group.permission.remove.usage: Invalid usage, try this: /bp group permission remove <group> <permission>
